original_text: Anyone who believes in the Son has life with God for ever. But anyone who refuses to obey the Son will never have life with God. God will continue to be angry with people like that.’
korean_text: 아들을 믿는 자에게는 영생이 있고 아들에게 순종하지 아니하는 자는 영생을 보지 못하고 도리어 하나님의 진노가 그 위에 머물러 있느니라

sentences.original_text: Anyone who believes in the Son
has life with God for ever
But anyone who refuses to obey the Son
will never have life with God
sentences.korean_translation: 결코 하나님과 함께하는 생명을 얻지 못할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God will continue to be angry with people like that
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그런 사람들에게 계속해서 진노하실 것입니다
